policy: direct fetch() should live in ui/services/*
notes: ui/app.js remains the legacy orchestration shell and still contains direct fetch() calls pending final decomposition.
All generation/agent/pipeline/auto-save/storyboard module fetch() usage was moved into ui/services/* in this cleanup pass.
Do not add new UI files here without explicit architectural review.
Entries added on 2026-02-16 are temporary and should trend toward zero.
